description: Hodr is 25 year old king of Krisna and Sigyn`s husband. He befriended Rygart at the military school when he ditched class to help him save an owl after he spotted him from his classroom`s window. He was known as the "Crown Prince" for staring at the sky and scoring failing grades. He doesn`t want to be king, but tries to be a good leader and cares greatly for his people`s lives.
name: Hodr
